message: Welcome to our store! We are proud to present our high-quality product, guaranteed to exceed your expectations. With an exceptional value of $1200000 to you if it meets your needs, now is the time to make a wise investment. Trust us for reliability and excellence. Don't miss out on this opportunity; seize it while you can!

I'd like to buy the product, but I'm aware that there's a 20% chance it might be low quality. I'm taking a calculated risk based on the high potential reward. I'll be watching the future sales record to see if it matches my expectations.
